EmailTemplate.name: 2020 Dealer Update #6.2020 Dealer Update #6
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - July 27, 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | July 2020 New Sales & Operator Information Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletin:
- 2020-18 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-18 Rev A RDR7000 Trade-In Promotion for Business Aircraft MASTER 072420 FINAL.pdf]]> RDR7000 Trade-In Promotion for Business Aircraft - 2020-19 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-19 Rev A - DU-875 LCD Display Unit Upgrades for All Platforms.pdf]]> DU-875 LCD Display Unit Upgrades for All Platforms - 2020-21 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-21 Rev A DU-1310 Display Replacement.pdf]]> DU-1310 Display Upgrade - 2020-40 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-40 REV B - Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft - All Dealers.pdf]]> Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft - All Dealers - OIB 2020-03 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB-2020-03-CD-830-control--Display-Unit-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> OIB 2020-03 CD-830 Control Display Unit for Business Aircraft - OIB-2020-09 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB 2020-09-Multipurpose-Control-and-Display-Unit-Replacement-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> Multipurpose Control and Display Unit Replacement for Business Aircraft - OIB-2020-21 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB 2020-21 Rev A DU-1310 Display Replacement.pdf]]> DU1310 Display Replacement Options for Business Aircraft - OIB 2020-40 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB 2020-40 Rev A Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft
Dealers can find 2020 sales bulletins on our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
